5 view->orientation = ViewOrientationHorizontal;

10 furi_assert(view);
11 view_free_model(view);
12 free(view);
13}

70void view_allocate_model(View* view, ViewModelType type, size_t size) {
71 furi_assert(view);
72 furi_assert(size > 0);
73 furi_assert(view->model_type == ViewModelTypeNone);
74 furi_assert(view->model == NULL);
75 view->model_type = type;
76 if(view->model_type == ViewModelTypeLockFree) {
77 view->model = malloc(size);
78 } else if(view->model_type == ViewModelTypeLocking) {
79 ViewModelLocking* model = malloc(sizeof(ViewModelLocking));
80 model->mutex = furi_mutex_alloc(FuriMutexTypeRecursive);
81 furi_check(model->mutex);
82 model->data = malloc(size);
83 view->model = model;
84 } else {
85 furi_crash();
86 }
87}
88
89void view_free_model(View* view) {
90 furi_assert(view);
91 if(view->model_type == ViewModelTypeNone) {
92 return;
93 } else if(view->model_type == ViewModelTypeLockFree) {
94 free(view->model);
95 } else if(view->model_type == ViewModelTypeLocking) {
96 ViewModelLocking* model = view->model;
97 furi_mutex_free(model->mutex);
98 free(model->data);
99 free(model);
100 view->model = NULL;
101 } else {
102 furi_crash();
103 }
104}
105
106void* view_get_model(View* view) {
107 furi_assert(view);
108 if(view->model_type == ViewModelTypeLocking) {
109 ViewModelLocking* model = (ViewModelLocking*)(view->model);
110 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(model->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
111 return model->data;
112 }
113 return view->model;
114}
115
116void view_commit_model(View* view, bool update) {
117 furi_assert(view);
118 view_unlock_model(view);
119 if(update && view->update_callback) {
120 view->update_callback(view, view->update_callback_context);
121 }
122}
123
124void view_icon_animation_callback(IconAnimation* instance, void* context) {
125 UNUSED(instance);
126 furi_assert(context);
127 View* view = context;
128 if(view->update_callback) {
129 view->update_callback(view, view->update_callback_context);
130 }
131}
132
133void view_unlock_model(View* view) {
134 furi_assert(view);
135 if(view->model_type == ViewModelTypeLocking) {
136 ViewModelLocking* model = (ViewModelLocking*)(view->model);
137 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(model->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
138 }
139}
140
141void view_draw(View* view, Canvas* canvas) {
142 furi_assert(view);
143 if(view->draw_callback) {
144 void* data = view_get_model(view);
145 view->draw_callback(canvas, data);
146 view_unlock_model(view);
147 }
148}
149
150bool view_input(View* view, InputEvent* event) {
151 furi_assert(view);
152 if(view->input_callback) {
153 return view->input_callback(event, view->context);
154 } else {
155 return false;
156 }
157}
158
159bool view_custom(View* view, uint32_t event) {
160 furi_assert(view);
161 if(view->custom_callback) {
162 return view->custom_callback(event, view->context);
163 } else {
164 return false;
165 }
166}
167
168uint32_t view_previous(View* view) {
169 furi_assert(view);
170 if(view->previous_callback) {
171 return view->previous_callback(view->context);
172 } else {
173 return VIEW_IGNORE;
174 }
175}
176
177void view_enter(View* view) {
178 furi_assert(view);
179 if(view->enter_callback) view->enter_callback(view->context);
180}
181
182void view_exit(View* view) {
183 furi_assert(view);
184 if(view->exit_callback) view->exit_callback(view->context);
185}
